data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tang, Chufei, Grootaert, Patrick, Yang, Ding (2018): Protomedetera, a new genus from the Oriental and Australasian realms (Diptera, Dolichopodidae, Medeterinae). ZooKeys 743: 137-151, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.743.22696, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.743.22696
